Introduction

SpectralVis provides a comprehensive set of functions dealing with spectra, human vision based on spectral data, etc.

Package Features

  • Spectral Operators
  • Spectral Types
  • Fundamental Metamers
  • Spectral Environment
  • Color Matching Functions
  • Cone Fundamentals
  • Spectral Based Simulation of color deficiency

Installation

This package can be installed with the Julia package manager. In the Julia REPL, type ] to enter the Pkg REPL mode and run the following command:

pkg> add SpectralVis

Reexport

Please note that SpectralVis uses other packages, like Colors and SSpline
